text: Landover Hills is a town in Prince George's County, Maryland, United States. == Education == Landover Hills is home to two private schools St Mary's Catholic School and New Hope Academy. St Mary's opened in 1954 initially offering only the 1st and 2nd grades. By 1961 all 8 grades were accounted for and enrollment grew to 1,126 students. == References == Category:Towns in Maryland
title: Landover Hills, Maryland
